file: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Complete third iteration of basic design sketches for SenseHear
data.task: Complete the third iteration of the basic design sketches for the SenseHear product to simulate actual user experience.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Conduct focus group survey for SenseHear
data.task: Conduct a focus group survey targeting potential consumers to verify the feasibility of functional requirements and market acceptance for SenseHear.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Complete technical verification version of the first prototype
data.task: Complete the technical verification version of the first prototype of SenseHear, focusing on integrating sensor modules and noise reduction technology while addressing computational delay issues.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Provide complete appearance model design
data.task: Provide a complete appearance model design for the SenseHear product to facilitate the launch of the first test advertisement wave.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Launch first wave of promotional test advertisements
data.task: Launch the first wave of promotional test advertisements for SenseHear, highlighting its brand strategy of 'Smart Listening, Healthy Living'.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: File patent application for contextual audio smart adjustment
data.task: Complete the patent application for the core feature of SenseHear - contextual audio smart adjustment - and initiate relevant confidentiality plans.
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Prepare survey questions and coordinate with designers
data.task: Prepare survey questions and coordinate with designers to ensure the completeness of user testing materials for the SenseHear focus group survey.
data.person: 王行銷主管, 李設計師
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md

data.title: Conduct bi-weekly progress review meetings
data.task: Conduct bi-weekly progress review meetings to ensure that all tasks are advancing on schedule for the SenseHear project.
data.person: 林經理, 周專案助理
data.source: Meeting/第二次新型科技產品發想及進度追蹤-會議記錄.md
